events.name: AFTERWORK BDD
events.description: The BDD is proposing 2 activities during this after-work session: planting flowers to take home and reusing everyday waste. Don't hesitate to attend this after-work session to ask any questions you may have about the BDD!

events.name: CONVIS RALLY
events.description: During the rally, you'll visit the 2A convis, where you'll take part in team games. The evening will end at the MDE once you've visited all the rooms!
